about_the_game:
The Winter Resort DLC "Techno Alpin Pack" offers you a variety of new machines - all are realistic replica by TechnoAlpin with original licenses.

You can now place the snow cannon T40 and the older M18 in different versions on and next to your slope. No matter if it’s a mobile version, placed on a tower, a lift or on a swivel arm - the package offers you the usual flexibility.

In addition to the snow cannons, the V3 snow lance is also available for some artificial snowmaking.

To position a snow cannon, you only have to click on the desired position in the shop. You do not have to drive to the respective location by yourself any longer. Also, your mobile snow cannon has now a water supply hose.


  • TechnoAlpin T40 snow cannon + chassis, tower, lift, swivel arm
  • TechnoAlpin M18 snow cannon + chassis, tower, lift, swivel arm
  • TechnoAlpin V3 snow lance
  • Mobile snow cannon on chassis including hose connection system
  • Fully animated tower, lift and swivel arm with hoses
detailed_description:
The Winter Resort DLC "Techno Alpin Pack" offers you a variety of new machines - all are realistic replica by TechnoAlpin with original licenses.

You can now place the snow cannon T40 and the older M18 in different versions on and next to your slope. No matter if it’s a mobile version, placed on a tower, a lift or on a swivel arm - the package offers you the usual flexibility.

In addition to the snow cannons, the V3 snow lance is also available for some artificial snowmaking.

To position a snow cannon, you only have to click on the desired position in the shop. You do not have to drive to the respective location by yourself any longer. Also, your mobile snow cannon has now a water supply hose.


  • TechnoAlpin T40 snow cannon + chassis, tower, lift, swivel arm
  • TechnoAlpin M18 snow cannon + chassis, tower, lift, swivel arm
  • TechnoAlpin V3 snow lance
  • Mobile snow cannon on chassis including hose connection system
  • Fully animated tower, lift and swivel arm with hoses

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU with 3.0 GHz and Hyper Threading
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM - Shader Model 5.1
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU with 3.5 GHz recommended
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM recommended

short_description: The Winter Resort DLC "Techno Alpin Pack" offers you a variety of new machines, as well as an expansion of existing ones - all are realistic replica by TechnoAlpin with original licenses.
